meanings.definition: Not marked or affected by a stain.
meanings.sent1: The white shirt remained unstained after the messy dinner.
meanings.sent2: She admired the unstained glass window in the old church.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's cape was magically unstained even after battling the mud monster.
meanings.sent4: Her reputation remained unstained despite the false rumors.
meanings.sent5: The fresh snow was as pure and unstained as a blank canvas.

meanings.sent1: The flawless diamond was truly unstained by any imperfections.
meanings.sent2: The clear sky was unstained by any clouds, a perfect blue expanse.
meanings.sent3: The chef proudly presented the unstained cake, perfectly smooth and unblemished.
meanings.sent4: Her heart was unstained by the hardships she faced, pure and resilient.
meanings.sent5: The crystal-clear lake reflected the unstained beauty of the surrounding mountains.
